org.itemscript.core.gwt
Class MultipleGet

java.lang.Object
  org.itemscript.core.gwt.MultipleGet
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasSystem
public class MultipleGet
extends java.lang.Object
implements HasSystem

A class to help with asychronously loading multiple resources.

Often you need to load more than one resource and have a callback that is only called when all of them have been successfully loaded. Doing this with a set of individual asychronous get requests can be awkward. This class lets you supply a set of URLs to be requested and a single callback that is notified when all of them have been successfully loaded.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org

Method Detail

get

public static MultipleGet get(JsonSystem system,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> urls,
                              MultipleGetCallback callback)
Get all of the supplied URLs, calling the relevant method on the callback when they have all been received.

Parameters:
system - The associated JsonSystem.
urls - A Map whose keys are identifiers used to distinguish the responses, and whose values are URLs to be retrieved.
callback - A callback to be called when all responses have been received.
Returns:
The MultipleGet object for this request, which can be tested for completion.

load

public static MultipleGet load(JsonSystem system,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> urls,
                               MultipleGetCallback callback)
Load all of the supplied URLs into the system at the supplied location, calling the relevant method on the callback when they have all been received. Values are loaded into the system immediately after being received, so even if some responses give errors, the ones that succeeded will still be loaded.

Note: the destination URLs must be ones that can be accessed synchronously, for instance mem: URLs.

Parameters:
system - The associated JsonSystem.
urls - A Map whose keys are the URLs to load the responses at, and whose values are URLs to be retrieved.
callback - A callbak to be called when all responses have been received.
Returns:
The MultipleGet object for this request, which can be tested for completion.

isComplete

public boolean isComplete()
Test whether all the responses in this MultipleGet have completed (successfully or in error).

Returns:
True if all responses have completed, false otherwise.
